title: Keerthy Suresh shares pics with ‘dream icon’ Vijay from her ‘dream wedding' with Antony Thattil in Goa - Hindustan Times
summary:
Keerthy Suresh shares pics with ‘dream icon’ Vijay from her ‘dream wedding' with Antony Thattil in Goa

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Keerthy Suresh recently tied the knot with her longtime boyfriend, Antony Thattil, in a beautiful ceremony held in Goa. A notable guest in attendance was her co-star, Thalapathy Vijay.

  • Keerthy shared photos from her wedding on Instagram, showing her and Antony in traditional wedding attire.
  • Vijay was seen alongside the couple, adding to the joy of the occasion.
  • Keerthy referred to Vijay as her 'dream icon' in her Instagram post celebrating the event.
  • The couple's dog featured in some pictures, showcasing their happiness during the wedding rituals.
  • Keerthy is set to appear in the upcoming film, 'Baby John', alongside Varun Dhawan, scheduled for release on December 25.
  • Vijay is currently filming his 69th project and plans to enter Tamil Nadu politics soon.
“When our dream icon blessed us at our dream weddinggg!” - Keerthy Suresh

This wedding not only marks a significant personal milestone for Keerthy Suresh but also highlights the camaraderie and mutual admiration among Tamil cinema stars.
newTitle: Keerthy Suresh's Dream Wedding with Vijay in Attendance

title: Mamta Kulkarni clarifies she's not returned to Mumbai for Bollywood: ‘Not planning to make a return as an actress’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Mamta Kulkarni Clarifies She's Not Returned to Mumbai for Bollywood

Publication Date: [Date of Publication] Source: [Source Name]

Mamta Kulkarni, who recently returned to Mumbai after 25 years, has made it clear that she does not plan to make a comeback as an actress.

  • Kulkarni stated, 'I have not come back for Bollywood and I am not planning to make a return as an actress.'
  • She spoke about her relationship with Vicky Goswami, emphasizing her lack of ties to the drug world.
  • A non-bailable warrant was issued against her and Goswami in connection with a drug investigation in 2017.
  • Kulkarni shared her emotional experience of returning to India after two decades.
  • She has expressed feelings of nostalgia upon revisiting her homeland.
“Now, I am not in touch with him, I last contacted him in 2016.”

The article highlights Kulkarni's personal reflections and connections to her past as she re-establishes her presence in Mumbai.
newTitle: Mamta Kulkarni Clarifies She's Not Returning to Bollywood

title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 14 [updated live]: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna’s film hits Rs 973 - TOI Etimes
summary:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 14 [Updated Live]

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The mass entertainer ‘Pushpa 2’, starring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to set records at the box office even after two weeks of release, nearing the Rs 1000 crore mark.

  • As of day 14, the film has collected a total of Rs 973.2 crore in India across all languages.
  • The day-wise collection indicates a steady performance, with notable earnings across Telugu (Rs 293.3 Cr) and Hindi (Rs 607.35 Cr).
  • The film is only Rs 26.2 crore short of reaching the Rs 1000 crore club.
  • 'Pushpa 2' has received a 3.5-star rating from ETimes, with praise for its direction and narrative depth.
“Director Sukumar’s brilliance shines through in 'Pushpa 2: The Rule.'”

‘Pushpa 2’ is set to be released on OTT in February 2025, with Netflix acquiring the rights for its streaming.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Box Office Hits Rs 973.2 Cr, Approaching Rs 1000 Crore Club

title: Allu Arjun's Father Meets Stampede Victim's Husband, Visits Injured Son In Hospital - News18
summary:
Allu Arjun's Father Meets Stampede Victim's Husband, Visits Injured Son In Hospital

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: News18

Allu Arjun’s father, Allu Aravind, visited a Hyderabad hospital to check on a child injured in the December 4 stampede during the screening of 'Pushpa 2: The Rule'. He also met with the family of the deceased woman.

  • Allu Aravind visited the injured child in the hospital.
  • The health of the child is critical; he has suffered brain damage and is on ventilator support.
  • Telangana Health Secretary and Hyderabad Police Commissioner also visited and provided updates on the child's condition.
  • The stampede resulted in the death of a 35-year-old woman and severe injuries to her 9-year-old son.
“I remain deeply concerned about young Sri Tej, who is under constant medical care after the unfortunate incident. My prayers remain with them...” - Allu Arjun

This incident has brought significant attention to safety measures during public events.
newTitle: Allu Arjun's Father Visits Hospital Following Stampede Incident

summary:
Diddy attends pretrial hearing amid legal battles

Date: Dec 19, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Sean “Diddy” Combs appears drastically changed during a recent court appearance, showing off a slimmer figure and grayer hair. This transformation follows his time in the Metropolitan Detention Center as he prepares for a trial on serious charges including racketeering and sex crimes.

  • Judge Arun Subramanian dismissed Diddy's claims about a leak of an assault video due to lack of evidence.
  • Diddy appeared notably thinner and grayer after months behind bars, as described by attendees of the hearing.
  • Attempts by Diddy's legal team to secure bail have been rejected multiple times.
  • The rapper has pleaded not guilty to all charges against him.
“He appeared just astonishingly thinner, which you can expect from him being inside a federal detention center,” said journalist Elizabeth Millner.

This dramatic appearance reflects the pressures Diddy faces as he approaches his trial next May.

title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 14: Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna film mints over ₹973 crore in 2 weeks - Hindustan Times
summary:
Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 14: Sukumar's sequel to his 2021 blockbuster stars Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil.

Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The film Pushpa 2: The Rule has achieved remarkable success, earning over ₹973 crore net in India within its first two weeks of release. The sequel to the 2021 blockbuster has seen fluctuations in its weekly collections, particularly enjoying a spike in the second week.

  • The film earned ₹18.83 crore net on its second Wednesday.
  • It collected ₹725.8 crore net in its first week.
  • Week two included a surge with collections of ₹63.3 crore and ₹76.6 crore over the weekend.
  • A tragic incident during its premiere led to the arrest of Allu Arjun, followed by a release on bail.
  • Allu Aravind visited a child victim hospitalized after the stampede incident.
“I just visited Sri Tej in the ICU. I have spoken to the doctors looking after him. The boy has been recovering slowly in the last 10 days, but it might take longer.” - Allu Aravind

The success of Pushpa 2 highlights the film's immense popularity and the challenges it faced due to unfortunate incidents during its premiere. The ongoing recovery efforts following the stampede continue to draw public attention.
newTitle: Pushpa 2: The Rule Box Office Collection Surpasses ₹973 Crore in Two Weeks

title: Was reminded of Amitabh Bachchan's 'Hum' while playing dual roles in 'Baby John': Varun Dhawan - Hindustan Times

Bollywood star Varun Dhawan shared that he drew inspiration from Amitabh Bachchan's classic film 'Hum' while preparing for his dual roles in the upcoming film 'Baby John'.

  • 'Hum', directed by Mukul Anand, featured a storyline about a dock worker who reshapes his identity to protect his family.
  • Dhawan described 'Baby John' as the most emotionally challenging role of his career.
  • The film marks the Hindi production debut of Atlee and features a strong supporting cast.
  • Dhawan expressed his gratitude towards the production team and collaborators, highlighting the challenges of releasing films in the current environment.
  • 'Baby John' is set to be released on December 25.
“There were certain scenes where I felt emotionally drained... sometimes I would just break down,” Dhawan reflects on his role.

This film is a notable entry in the holiday slate for Bollywood and showcases both established and new talent.
